review: I have two of these and im not impressed. I bought them because i love my fire tv box so i figured for my other TV's i would go with the stick, wrong. One TV it seems to work ok but has a problem streaming content. According to the network setting i have a strong WIFI connection. On my other TV with the other stick i have network issues with the stick loosing connection and the only fix is to unplug and re plug. I think the stick is also picky on the hdmi port you plug it in to as well. Ive had better luck with it plugged into my TV than receiver, which i do not like because everything else goes thru the receiver. Overall im not satisfied with the stick at the moment. I also think the remote is lesser quality than the remote for the box (yes i know it doesn't have voice search). The remote for the stick seems to creek and squeak when using it, especially the circular navigation. Im hoping that they have some fixes coming soon. Ill probably end up replacement them with the box as im a firm believer of having streaming devices hard wired, plus i already have a network drop at each tv.
